item.title: Twitter Updates for 2008-06-03
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: @tylerwhitaker no, I’ve been pretty happy with theplanet ðŸ™‚ # Have you run your backups this morning? # @cameronmoll it would be nice to even be able to reply to a tweet, the best you can do now is reply to a person # Powered by Twitter Tools.
item.content:encoded:
• @tylerwhitaker no, I’ve been pretty happy with theplanet #
  • Have you run your backups this morning? #
  • @cameronmoll it would be nice to even be able to reply to a tweet, the best you can do now is reply to a person #

Powered by Twitter Tools.

item.title: Twitter Updates for 2008-06-02
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: @tylerwhitaker I’ve got a server at theplanet, didn’t know about the fire. my server didn’t go down # @telegramsam you were right, turns out twitter is tightly coupled http://is.gd/oTM # Has the Twitter folks read http://tinyurl.com/6rqc5c ? # @tylerwhitaker where are you looking to move hosting to? # Powered by Twitter Tools.
item.content:encoded:
• @tylerwhitaker I’ve got a server at theplanet, didn’t know about the fire. my server didn’t go down #
  • @telegramsam you were right, turns out twitter is tightly coupled http://is.gd/oTM #
  • Has the Twitter folks read http://tinyurl.com/6rqc5c ? #
  • @tylerwhitaker where are you looking to move hosting to? #

Powered by Twitter Tools.

item.title: Twitter Updates for 2008-05-29
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: @51Future wordpress.com had some network issues between datacenters, should be fixed now # @blakewingo what’s WP not cooperating on? # @MikeG1 – few network hiccups on WordPress.com, should be working now # @tylerwhitaker @bradbaldwin @jessestay WordPress 2.6 will have some gears support http://is.gd/nHz # @tylerwhitaker it’s in WordPress -trunk right now # @JesseStay probably after […]
item.content:encoded:
• @51Future wordpress.com had some network issues between datacenters, should be fixed now #
  • @blakewingo what’s WP not cooperating on? #
  • @MikeG1 – few network hiccups on WordPress.com, should be working now #
  • @tylerwhitaker @bradbaldwin @jessestay WordPress 2.6 will have some gears support http://is.gd/nHz #
  • @tylerwhitaker it’s in WordPress -trunk right now #
  • @JesseStay probably after 2.6 is released, which is planned for August at this point. #
  • @ajfortin I don’t see anything obviously wrong with your WordPress.com account, are you still having problems? #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
